name: Another Block Breaker Clone
description:
Out of the third lecture for the c# classes I'm taking we did a Arkanoid clone. This is a short 3 level game. All assets either have the Creative Commons licence or made by me. 

Sounds from: freesound.org
Font from: http://www.dafont.com/blocked.font
Class: https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse/learn/v4/overview
